meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Reid Setzer Roberta Chapman Steven Grade Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7961.

td.p: Reid Setzer, a public policy director from Washington, D.C.
Roberta Chapman, a tour guide from Alexandria, Virginia
Steven Grade, a sports industry consultant from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $64,200)

tr.td: AN APRIL TO REMEMBER
TV FUNNY BUSINESS
THE WORLD OF MONEY
CROSSWORD CLUES "Y"
AROUND THE BODY
IN PRISON

Roberta
Reid
THEY TURNED MY BOOK INTO A MOVIE
(Alex: You identify the author of each book for us.)
CLOTHING
DUEL PERSONALITIES
MOROCCO
MISCELLANY
MULTILINGUAL OVERLAPS
(Alex: Let me give you an example. "French hello and an English diary". The correct response would be, "What is a bonjournal?")
